description: Single technical term — Whisper mishears 'Kubernetes' as phonetic fragments or wrong casing, dictionary should force exact spelling
spokenText: we need to deploy the new service to cooper net ease and make sure the cooper net ease cluster is healthy
expectedOutput: We need to deploy the new service to Kubernetes and make sure the Kubernetes cluster is healthy.

description: Acronyms — Whisper spells out 'CI/CD' phonetically and drops the slash, dictionary should restore exact format including slash
spokenText: our see I see dee pipeline is broken again and the dev ops team needs to fix it before the next release
expectedOutput: Our CI/CD pipeline is broken again and the DevOps team needs to fix it before the next release.

description: Person name with difficult spelling — Whisper phonetically approximates 'Szymanowski', dictionary should correct to exact spelling
spokenText: please forward the report to she man off ski and make sure she man off ski reviews it by friday
expectedOutput: Please forward the report to Szymanowski and make sure Szymanowski reviews it by Friday.

description: Product names — Whisper breaks 'PostgreSQL' into fragments and misspells it, dictionary should correct to exact product names
spokenText: we are migrating the database from post gres sequel to a managed instance and adding read us as the caching layer
expectedOutput: We are migrating the database from PostgreSQL to a managed instance and adding Redis as the caching layer.

description: Multiple dictionary terms in one passage — several tools from the Kubernetes ecosystem are misheard and must all be corrected
spokenText: first run cube cuddle to check the cooper net ease pods then verify that et see dee is reachable and finally use helm to deploy the updated charts
expectedOutput: First run kubectl to check the Kubernetes pods, then verify that etcd is reachable, and finally use Helm to deploy the updated charts.

description: Dictionary terms embedded in speech with fillers and self-correction — misheard terms must be corrected while fillers are removed and self-correction is resolved
spokenText: so um we need to update the terra form I mean the terra form config for a w s no wait for a w s production and make sure the terra form plan looks clean
expectedOutput: We need to update the Terraform config for AWS production and make sure the Terraform plan looks clean.
